column2: Everybody comes in, including the vile gang, MS13, which Nancy Pelosi has gone out and wants to protect, OK?
column4: Says "Nancy Pelosi came out in favor of MS13."

column2: And now, for the first time in 22 years, wages are rising again.
column4: After years of wage stagnation, we are finally seeing rising wages.
